page.title: 04A Child's Day in Goffs Oak
page.content:
A typical day for 9 year old Pepi. **********************************
At 7:00 a.m. I wake up and stay in bed for half an hour,then listen to records.At 8.00 I have breakfast then I go upstairs and get dressed.At 8.30 I get my bag ready.At 8.40 I knock for Damien and we walk to school together. When we are at school we get the chairs down. At lunch time I go to somebody else's house. After lunch we play a game until 1.00. When I get home from school I play football until 4.15 then I go in and have something to drink and eat.I watch television until dinner time. After dinner I do different events.On Monday, cubs; on Wednesday,gym; Thursday,football; on Friday,swimming.
